Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: My IPhone came exactly on time with everything stated in the ad. Basically, it's brand new! I am so pleased with it. Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Ballester
Reviews.Content: The phone is outstanding, I wish I had made the switch to the iPhone sooner. I love this phone a lot

Reviews.Title: Faulty Headphone jack ruined it
Reviews.Author: Chloe Moran
Reviews.Content: i received it quickly, which was nice. And there wasn't much visible damage. Butwhat the listing failed to tell me was that the headphone jack is faulty, and only plays music outof the left headphone, no matter what wards or headphones you use. This really sums for mebecause part of there reason I like iPhones so much is the fact that they can be used for music.honestly, this blows. You're better off just buying a new one.

Reviews.Title: really upset about this transaction but is toi late now I guess I suck it up
Reviews.Author: laura
Reviews.Content: camera don't work phone is great except no cámara now is too late so I would have too suck it up

Reviews.Title: very goog
Reviews.Author: Kechunming
Reviews.Content: Mobile phone signal is very good, and the function, used in Chinese perfect, I use China Mobile. A shopping very happy!

Reviews.Title: I phone
Reviews.Author: STEVEN HIRSCH
Reviews.Content: Good price with an optional 2 year guarantee. I can keep my unlimited data plan and pay the same monthly rate without a contract.

Reviews.Title: it is not so bad huh ;）
Reviews.Author: Ruiwen Luo
Reviews.Content: by now it works well except for some abnormal resprings and i will keep using and watching it.  By the way, this iphone is sold on 2012/11/28  :(

Reviews.Title: it really helpful
Reviews.Author: Phyohtet
Reviews.Content: it help me a lot of things for my work and school, also it really easy to find the locatin that i need

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations!
Reviews.Author: health guru "Don"
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new iPhone 5!  It is so intuitive and user friendly.  It has taken the place of my laptop computer.  It has exceeded my expectations.  I got mine on a Sprint contract, which is what I recommend for a less expensive price.

Reviews.Title: Can only hear portions of phone calls--VERIZON iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: PeacefulSeeker
Reviews.Content: Tech support suggested the problem might be the SIM card. The SIM card was sent to the wrong address so I could not determine if that is the problem.I phone 2 days ago and was told another SIM card would arrive at my address by 3PM yesterday.I phoned today, having not received a SIM card yesterday and was told it was sent, not to my address that I gave (which is the same address to which the iPhone 5 was sent) but to a wrong address.I have had a hellish experience with verizonwireless the past 2 years, first w/Android, now with iPhone. I vowed that would not go back to verizonwireless until I found that the iPhone had a better reputation that Android.The common denominator here is verizonwireless. My hassles are related to that company's lack of support for different devices--so am I stuck with a malfunctioning phone for ANOTHER 2 years?
